text.jpText:
……っ！？
な……今のは一体、なんだというの！？
text.enText:
…! I'm sure you'll be happy to know that 
I'm not the only one who has a problem with 
this… What the hell was that?

text.jpText:
……驚いた。でも、悪い気分じゃない。
それどころか、胸があたたかくて……。
text.enText:
… I was surprised. But I don't 
feel bad. On the contrary, my heart 
was warm and… happy.

text.jpText: まるで、力が溢れてくるようだわ……！
text.enText: It's as if I'm flooded with power…!
